name: Hamsterlings
description:
A boxful of special laboratory hamsters escape to the nature! Help them survive and find their friends!
Hamsterlings is a Lemmings like puzzle-platformer with a little twist in it. Guide the hamsters through 140 levels of fun and surprise. Jump over obstacles, build bridges, watch out for spiky cactuses, and much more!

Features:
- Simple and fun controls: tap a hamster to jump or to use a collected item!
- Fun and Interactive environment! Almost everything can be tapped!
- Cute and funny hamsters!
- A total of 140 levels: 60 for free, and an additional 80 that can be purchased.
- Contribute your achieved stars to a global star counter to help us get 1 million stars!

Have Fun!
